title: An Eccentric one surrounded by vassals!

text_block_list.text:
One day. After finishing my work out in the field 
I was returning to Tracen, when—

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Oh! Trainer! 
Good timing!
Mirako has come down with the flu and I was in search of a replacement! Come, keep me company!
text_block_list.name: No Reason
No Reason
text_block_list.text: Whoa～!! This is amazing!! It's like a cola exhibition!
It seems it's an event called "Cola Fest" and a famous cola manufacturer is renting a mall for it.
It's an event where you can sample various craft-colas from all across the country. Furthermore you can also get a look into the manufacturing and history of cola.
choice_data_list: Hey now, don't run off on me.

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Nya ha ha ha! If you won't let up here, when will you!? 
Look Trainer! Let's go join that feast there!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: I've been thinking for a while now… but if we take the great food culture of Japan, and mix cola with it, then surely we will birth some new unbelievable flavors, will we not?

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Oh well, drink up! 
This is my own special brew— Dashi Cola!

Oh! This one has a deep, sharp taste! 
Compared to the one earlier, this leaves a tingly feeling on the tongue!
text_block_list.name: No Reason
No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Man, cola is so delicious— Urp. 
C'mon, one more cup—

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: For a warlord, this much is nothing! That aside, my strategist, why don't you drink with me? Is your cup empty? Here, I'll pour you another one!

I saw a sign that had various trivia written on it about cola. 
…I see, if the temperature is high, it's hard to feel the carbonation.
choice_data_list: That's why they recommend it cold…

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
There's various trivia here, huh. 
Next is the history～ The history of it all～～!

text_block_list.name: Host A
text_block_list.text: "The Duo Scramble for the Limited Cola Obstacle Race" will begin soon! Please make your way to the main stage when you've finished applying!"

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's time for battle, huh? 
Are you ready to take the field, my strategist?
choice_data_list: Is this why you brought me here?

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Indeed! My original plan was to have Mirako accompany me, well… Those who accept that life won't turn out the way they want, will live content in their lives. Quote by Tokugawa Ieyasu

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Our team name shall be "World Conquerors"! 
—Now then, let us set forth!

text_block_list.name: Host A
text_block_list.text: The first event will be the "Cola Relay"! Teams will have to fill their mugs to the brim with cola and run without spilling it!

text_block_list.name: Host A
text_block_list.text: The teams will run 4 laps around the entrance! The first one to break away is—

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Ka ka ka! I've confirmed a path for us to take, since no matter where you run it's slimy! Now then, let us set forth!
I remember seeing her run a few laps around the entrance shortly before arriving myself. Don't tell me that was her checking for the least slippery path!?

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: A-hem! We have the advantage! Now hurry and take this mug! We can't waste this advantage!

text_block_list.name: Host A
text_block_list.text: The top placing of the group moves on to the 2nd stage! Next up we have, "The Cola Quiz"! You have to taste the cola and identify it!
choice_data_list: (…W-what do I do? I can't identify them!)

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
…It isn't sweet. And it has quite the sharp kick to it. 
With a profile like that, I can exclude a lot of brands…

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
It appears I have a few options… Alright, I've decided. 
This one is "Village Cola"!

text_block_list.name: Host A
text_block_list.text:
…S-she's right! She got it in one try! 
With no penalties, she's cleared the 2nd stage!
choice_data_list: …All that sampling earlier, was it for this?

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Nya ha ha! The difference between victory and defeat is knowing how to prepare for the battle ahead of time!

text_block_list.name: Host A
text_block_list.text:
The final stage is the "Bottled Cola Chugging Battle"! 
Everyone starts with 3 bottles, and whichever team finishes the 3 bottles first, claims the championship!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Heh! Leave it to me, my strategist! Eliminate one bottle yourself! I shall take on the last two myself and close out this battle!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Forward! Victory is within our grasp! Charge forth!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Urk… I… can't drink anymore… 
Oh no… the carbonation… Uuuuuuu～
The source of this predicament must be when she sampled all those different colas. In the time I was able to drink 2 bottles, she wasn't able to drink 1! I had to pick up the pace!
Aiight!! It was a struggle to get this far, but look at me! This is the true power of my "Iizuka Vaccum"!
choice_data_list: Who is this person that's proud of drinking fast!?
text_block_list.name: The Previous Champ
Host A
text_block_list.text: Whoa!? The Iizuka Vaccum is downing cola at an impressive pace! She's already downed a whole bottle!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Grrrrr! I won't lose! My victory… My limited edition cola!
I only need to down one more bottle, but I don't think I'll win if I go without a plan. To claim victory, I need to come up with something fast—
Then, I saw the perspiration on the plastic bottles. And at that same moment, I remembered—
choice_data_list: If the temp is high, then you can't feel the carbonation!

text_block_list.text: What the!? A member of team "World Conquerors" is drinking the remaining cola by themselves! —They're downing it at an unprecedented pace!
text_block_list.name: Host A
No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Whoa!? That speed! 
Go for it! Finish it, my Strategist!!

text_block_list.name: Host A
text_block_list.text:
Who will it be!? Will it be World Conquerors!? Will it be Vacuum!? 
World Conquerors!? Vacuum!? And the winner is—

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Woooo! Nice going!! That was a splendid way of drinking! I bestow upon you my praise!
choice_data_list: No, it was thanks to your tactics.
No, it was thanks to your tactics.

text_block_list.text: It was only at the end that I gave it my all. For the rest of the competition, it was thanks to her plans that it went so smoothly.

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Fufu, is that so?

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Well, that could be a possibility, right? 
Nya ha ha ha!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: However, to secure victory, you targeted the cola that was at a higher temperature— A stroke of genius, my strategist!

If it was from that placard earlier, I also saw it, but… 
At the 11th hour, you employed it masterfully.
text_block_list.name: No Reason
No Reason
text_block_list.text:
…Was it a tactic due to having your back to the wall? 
No, that isn't it. It wasn't like that at all.
…Heh. Your blade was sharp after all.
text_block_list.name: No Reason
No Reason
text_block_list.text:
…Ka ka ka! You proved your worth well, Sir Strategist! 
Thanks to you— Come hither! The victors today are us!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: The fact that we've slain the supreme commander, I am satisfied with that result! If there be another battle, can I count on you?

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: …Mhm.

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: — To unify this land, they are essential to that dream.

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: I can't let them betray me anytime soon. Nya ha ha.
